attributes.action: Limit Parliament's 2009 summer recess to 2 weeks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the current economic climate prevails in 2009, it would be more prudent if MP's holidays were limited to 2 weeks.  It was obscene that that the 2008 recess continued for so long when the rest of the people in the country are worried sick about their jobs and homes being under threat.  MP's should try living in the real world on the minimum wage!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
